{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WBR2-G54S |revision= |upc=747464109220 |ean= |asin=B0002UECUM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/18/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-04600142-0 |ic_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=1.1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed=200 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,Tomato,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=000D0BXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^000D0B[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:0B |oui_eth=00:0D:0B }} {{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WBR2-G54S}}
[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Flash_Your_Buffalo_WBR-G54%2C_WLA-G54%2C_... On the DD-WRT wiki] The default SSID is the LAN MAC address (upper case letters). The included power adapter is a '''Buffalo''' KTL SU10160-3004 , AT7094A (3.3V, 2A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
